sentences.en: A very considerable trade passed northward and southward through Jerusalem.
sentences.cn: 大量贸易经过耶路撒冷走向北方和南方.

sentences.en: As they were crawling southward they spotted a small freighter.
sentences.cn: 他们正向南徐徐航行时,发现了一条小货船.

sentences.en: Even now there might have been time for the southward march.
sentences.cn: 甚至在这时,也还是来得及向南行进的.

sentences.en: From Simao we drove southward through the mountains towards Jinghong.
sentences.cn: 我们的车了从思茅往南开,通过丛山,开往景洪.

sentences.en: From the map, one can see water spilling eastward and southward.
sentences.cn: 在地图上可以看出湖水向东和向南奔泻.

sentences.en: Instead of her normal southward course towards Alexandria and home, she headed west.
sentences.cn: 她不走平常向南去亚历山大和家乡的路，而是向西走。

sentences.en: It had been sliding strangely southward.
Southward , the slim light - house lifted its little gray length.
sentences.cn: 南边,挺立着又细又高, 灰白色的灯塔.

sentences.en: The current was bearing coracle and schooner southward at an equal rate.
sentences.cn: 急流正以同样的速度将小筏子和西斯潘尼奥拉号一起冲向南方.

sentences.en: The current was coracle and schooner southward at an equal rate.
sentences.cn: 潮流以同样的速度带着大船和小艇向南滑行.

sentences.en: The Northern Armies were to shoulder their way southward by offensive action.
sentences.cn: 北方各集团军采取攻势向南进军.

sentences.en: The rain belt is moving southward ; it will be sunny here eventually.
sentences.cn: 雨带即将南移, 我们这里终于要放晴了.

sentences.en: The Sahara desert, for example, creeps southward at a rate of thirty miles annually.
sentences.cn: 例如, 撒哈拉沙漠以每年30英里的速度向南方推移.

sentences.en: The street extends southward about three miles.
sentences.cn: 这条街向南延伸约三英里.

trans.tran_en: Southward or southwards means toward the south
